title: The Space Witch / Triplanetary
description: Classical Science fiction at it's best featuring two complete stories. 1.....The Space Witch.....Hideous Witch or alluring woman Marcia could choose. But it isn't easy to decide. Both have their advantages. 2.....Triplanetary.....A epic story from the famous writer E.E. Doc Smith. Now, systematically, and precisely, the great cone of battle was coming into being; a formation developed during the jovian wars while the forces of three planets were fighting in space.
author: Walter M. Miller Jr.
